name: Lost Amulets
description:
The Lost Amulets is a combination of hidden object games and tile-matching puzzles and also has a variety of mini games. Along your journey you'll visit hundreds of unique locations and collect power-up pearls. Reveal the magic spells and restore the sparkling gems of the magical amulets.

- 3 game modes
- 100+ levels of game play
- Challenging mini games
- Immersive environments
- 6 beautiful tile sets
